Name: Molly's Milk
Ingredients: 45 ml Southern/Louisiana-style whisky liqueur (e.g. Southern Comfort)
Instructions: STIR first two ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass. FLOAT whipped cream on drink.
Review: Herbal, honeyed Irish whiskey drunk through a creamy head.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 1997 by Dale DeGroff at Molly Malone's Pub, Prague, Czech Republic. Dale's original recipe calls for  45ml Irish whiskey and 45ml Irish Mist liqueur topped with lightly whipped cream.
Nutrition: One serving of Molly's Milk contains 213 calories
